failure.message:
Error: locator.textContent: Target page, context or browser has been closed Call log: - waiting for locator('//h5[contains(text(),\'Hello, welcome to the QUGEM homepage.\')]')
at ../.cucumber/stepDefinitions/steps_DashboardPage.js:50
48 | Then('I should see the message {string}', async ({ page }, expectedText) => { //expected text is coming from feature file with a parameter value 49 | const textLocator = page.locator(dashboard.helloToHomePageText); > 50 | const actualText = await textLocator.textContent() | ^ 51 | expect(actualText.trim()).toBe(expectedText); 52 | }); 53 |
